instruction: Select WebMoney on the left box and PayPal (USD/EUR/GBP) on the right. Enter your desired exchange amount.
Click “Exchange” and enter your PayPal details and email address. Once again, Click on the “Exchange” button and complete the Captcha.
Review your order details and read the instructions carefully! obtain a tracking ID, an address, and an Explorer URL.
Transfer the WebMoney to HiExchange WebMoney account and then click on “Pay Order”
